reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Achieving national targets towards HIV elimination as a public health issue by decentralizing testing services to primary health care level and improving data collection systems

description.narrative: Ecuador - HIV - Ministry of Public Health of the Republic of Ecuador - MSP. This program has the following goals: Support the achievement of the 90-90-90 goals by intensifying preventive activities and reducing barriers that hinder access of key populations to health services.. . The objectives of this program are: Increase the access of key populations to HIV prevention and early diagnosis.. Promote linkages with health services, early initiation of treatment and adherence.. Strengthen health and justice service, as well as access to justive, with a human rights and participatory approach.
